column1: A spectacular field blooming with plant life.
A flock of large winged creatures, several miles above.
Dark blue plant-like lifeforms, covering a nearby hill.
A drove of hoofed creatures running at incredible speed across a field.
A lake covered in floating, ambulating lifeforms.
Large tree-like lifeforms forming a field, many miles wide, each one separated from each other by exactly 346 feet.
An inconceivably large creature, slowly making its way across a valley.
A strange gaseous iridescence, a few miles away.
A series of stone arches covered with hanging vine-like lifeforms.
A wet swamp-like area, its strange sounds and sights almost overwhelming.
